zone.line: Awful Shape, what art thou? Speak
Demogorgon
Eternity — demand no direr name.
Descend, & follow me down the abyss;
I am thy child, as thou art Saturn's...as thou wert Saturn's child
Mightier than thee and we must dwell penttogether
Henceforth in darkness—lift thy lightnings not—
The tyranny of Heaven none may retain
Or reassume, or hold succeeding thee ...
Yet if thou wilt—as tis the destiny 60
Of trodden worms to writhe till they are
dead—
Put forth thy might
Jupiter
Detested prodigy!
Even thus beneath the deep Titanian prisons
I trample thee! thou lingerest?
Mercy, mercy
No 64pity—no release, no respite! . . oh 65
That thou wouldst make mine enemy my judge.
Even where he hangs, seared by my long revenge
